data.prayer: Father, convict the 18,608 believers in Drenthe to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Drenthe, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,608 believers in the state of Drenthe.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Drenthe
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 18,608 believers in Drenthe to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 445,093 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Thai people.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Drenthe, Netherlands.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Drenthe, Netherlands to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the state of Drenthe, Netherlands has a population of 463,700.

We estimate Drenthe has 18,608 people who might know Jesus, 198,719 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 246,374 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Drenthe, Netherlands.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

location.name: Drenthe
